name: 35th World Pediatrics Conference
content: Dear Sir/Madam We are pleased to extend an invitation to you and to your organization to participate in Speaker/Delegate or Organizing Committee Member at “35th World Pediatrics Conference” which is going to be held during August 01-02, 2022 at Rome, Italy. If you are unable to attend the conference in person, I encourage you to give your presentation as online session or as an e-Poster. Website Link: https://worldpediatrics.pediatricsconferences.org/ Sebastian Lucas Program Manager World Pediatrics-2022 | August 01-02, 2022 Email: events@globalconferencemeet.com; worldpediatrics@pediatricsmeetings.com WhatsApp: +44-3308084552
